Demonstrating years of leadership and honoring a commitment to serve  the nearly 80,000 residents of Baldwin Park as the city's first  Mexican-American chief executive officer, Mr. Zaldivar paved his own  path to enhance city operations and make our community a better place.

…RASKIN. Even in the case of a SWAT team, the gentleman is saying  that a member of a SWAT team would not have a semiautomatic weapon?

Mr. RASKIN. Are they not issued to the officer?
